dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Ilya Sutskever
Geoffrey E Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. The authors utilized the first 10,000 samples for a binary classification problem distinguishing between even and odd digits.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: A dataset of fashion items used for training image classification models. The authors referred to a binary classification problem using the first 10,000 samples.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, used for training image classification models. The authors mentioned a binary classification problem using the first 10,000 samples.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
